title: Just a patch of scrub
creator_contributor_role: World Wide Fund for Nature Australia, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Salinity - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest conservation
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Conservation of natural resources - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Soil erosion - Australia
description: Overviews traditional problems with the land including clearing, soil erosion and salinity. Discusses the importance of preserving and benefits of remnant native vegetation and shows the revegatation of a wasteland area where land had been cleared. Includes comprehensive teaching notes.
